page.title: 19Transport,Scremerston.
page.content: The A1 trunk road used to pass through the centre of the village but in {1983}a bypass was opened and now in {1985}the village is a quiet peaceful place.Lots of cars,buses, lorries and vans used to pass through Scremerston and it was very noisy. You can still hear the noise of traffic on the bypass but now it is very easy to cross the road and the people at each side of the village can meet and stand and talk without being deafened by the traffic. The nearest railway station is in {Berwick}and the{United Bus Company}run the{505 Service}through the village so it is easy to travel to{Newcastle}or {Edinburgh}by bus or train.There is also a bus service to{Wooler}and one to{Seahouses.
